prompt:
Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Lanlan Dang?

Patient: Yes. It is.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming. Could you please provide your date of birth for verification purposes?

Patient: March fourteen nineteen sixty eight.

Nurse: Thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Dang. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy on August 17 at 10:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Hi. Of course, it is.

Nurse: Hello, Mr. Great, thank you, Mr. Dang. I hope your day is going well so far. How are you feeling about your upcoming colonoscopy procedure?

Patient: Why my tummy is hurting

responses.gpt4: I'm sorry to hear you're experiencing some discomfort. Just to clarify, are you saying you are currently feeling abdominal pain?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing abdominal pain, Mr. Dang. Can you tell me a bit more about it?
